com.yahoo.document.serialization

Interface DocumentSerializer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AnnotationWriter, DocumentUpdateWriter, DocumentWriter, FieldWriter, Serializer, SpanNodeWriter, SpanTreeWriter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    VespaDocumentDeserializer42, VespaDocumentDeserializerHead, VespaDocumentSerializer42, VespaDocumentSerializerHead

    public interface DocumentSerializer
extends DocumentWriter, SpanNodeWriter, AnnotationWriter, SpanTreeWriter, DocumentUpdateWriter
    Interface for serializing documents. A particular instance of this class is tied to a version of the document format.
    Author:
    geirst
